description: Mobile techniques used by Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.OpFake.a, ATT&CK software S0308 v1.0
name: Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.OpFake.a (S0308)

techniques.comment: [Trojan-SMS.AndroidOS.OpFake.a](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0308) uses Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) for command and control.(Citation: Kaspersky-MobileMalware)
